taxonConcepts.nameAccordingTo: Species 2000 & ITIS Catalogue of Life: April 2013

dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#GeneralDescription
dataObjects.title: Biology
dataObjects.description: Is very active and is always moving.  Frequently found in well oxygenated waters (Ref. 12225).  Occurs mainly near the surface and at times jumps out of the water.  Feeds on worms, insect larvae and small fishes (Ref. 7020).

dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#Distribution
dataObjects.description: South America:  Negro and Orinoco River basins and coastal rivers in Guyana, Suriname, and French Guiana.

dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#Distribution
dataObjects.description: Negro and Orinoco River basins, and coastal rivers of northern South America: Brazil, Colombia, French Guiana, Guyana, Suriname and Venezuela.
